testsuite.name: com.example.ktbapi.proxy.ProxyTest

testcase.name: 순수 JPA로 프록시 초기화: 게터 접근 시점에 SELECT 발생
LAZY 프록시 동작: isLoaded → false, initialize 후 true

testsuite.system-out: 2025-11-10T08:32:59.262+09:00 INFO 73264 --- [ Test worker] t.c.s.AnnotationConfigContextLoaderUtils : Could not detect default configuration classes for test class [com.example.ktbapi.proxy.ProxyTest]: ProxyTest does not declare any static, non-private, non-final, nested classes annotated with @Configuration. 2025-11-10T08:32:59.264+09:00 INFO 73264 --- [ Test worker] .b.t.c.SpringBootTestContextBootstrapper : Found @SpringBootConfiguration com.example.ktbapi.KtbapiApplication for test class com.example.ktbapi.proxy.ProxyTest 2025-11-10T08:32:59.267+09:00 DEBUG 73264 --- [ Test worker] org.hibernate.SQL : insert into "user" (created_at, email, nickname, password, profile_image, user_role, updated_at, user_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, default) Hibernate: insert into "user" (created_at, email, nickname, password, profile_image, user_role, updated_at, user_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, default) 2025-11-10T08:32:59.267+09:00 DEBUG 73264 --- [ Test worker] org.hibernate.SQL : insert into posts (user_id, content, created_at, image_url, likes, title, updated_at, views, post_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, default) Hibernate: insert into posts (user_id, content, created_at, image_url, likes, title, updated_at, views, post_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, default) 2025-11-10T08:32:59.268+09:00 DEBUG 73264 --- [ Test worker] org.hibernate.SQL : select p1_0.post_id, p1_0.user_id, p1_0.content, p1_0.created_at, p1_0.image_url, p1_0.likes, p1_0.title, p1_0.updated_at, p1_0.views from posts p1_0 where p1_0.post_id=? Hibernate: select p1_0.post_id, p1_0.user_id, p1_0.content, p1_0.created_at, p1_0.image_url, p1_0.likes, p1_0.title, p1_0.updated_at, p1_0.views from posts p1_0 where p1_0.post_id=? 초기화 전 isLoaded = false 프록시 실제 클래스 = com.example.ktbapi.user.model.User$HibernateProxy 2025-11-10T08:32:59.270+09:00 DEBUG 73264 --- [ Test worker] org.hibernate.SQL : select u1_0.user_id, u1_0.created_at, u1_0.email, u1_0.nickname, u1_0.password, u1_0.profile_image, u1_0.user_role, u1_0.updated_at from "user" u1_0 where u1_0.user_id=? Hibernate: select u1_0.user_id, u1_0.created_at, u1_0.email, u1_0.nickname, u1_0.password, u1_0.profile_image, u1_0.user_role, u1_0.updated_at from "user" u1_0 where u1_0.user_id=? 게터 접근으로 초기화됨, nickname = ProxyUser2 게터 접근 후 isLoaded = true 2025-11-10T08:32:59.275+09:00 DEBUG 73264 --- [ Test worker] org.hibernate.SQL : insert into "user" (created_at, email, nickname, password, profile_image, user_role, updated_at, user_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, default) Hibernate: insert into "user" (created_at, email, nickname, password, profile_image, user_role, updated_at, user_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, default) 2025-11-10T08:32:59.275+09:00 DEBUG 73264 --- [ Test worker] org.hibernate.SQL : insert into posts (user_id, content, created_at, image_url, likes, title, updated_at, views, post_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, default) Hibernate: insert into posts (user_id, content, created_at, image_url, likes, title, updated_at, views, post_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, default) 2025-11-10T08:32:59.276+09:00 DEBUG 73264 --- [ Test worker] org.hibernate.SQL : select p1_0.post_id, p1_0.user_id, p1_0.content, p1_0.created_at, p1_0.image_url, p1_0.likes, p1_0.title, p1_0.updated_at, p1_0.views from posts p1_0 where p1_0.post_id=? Hibernate: select p1_0.post_id, p1_0.user_id, p1_0.content, p1_0.created_at, p1_0.image_url, p1_0.likes, p1_0.title, p1_0.updated_at, p1_0.views from posts p1_0 where p1_0.post_id=? 초기화 전 isLoaded = false 프록시 실제 클래스 = com.example.ktbapi.user.model.User$HibernateProxy 2025-11-10T08:32:59.276+09:00 DEBUG 73264 --- [ Test worker] org.hibernate.SQL : select u1_0.user_id, u1_0.created_at, u1_0.email, u1_0.nickname, u1_0.password, u1_0.profile_image, u1_0.user_role, u1_0.updated_at from "user" u1_0 where u1_0.user_id=? Hibernate: select u1_0.user_id, u1_0.created_at, u1_0.email, u1_0.nickname, u1_0.password, u1_0.profile_image, u1_0.user_role, u1_0.updated_at from "user" u1_0 where u1_0.user_id=? 강제 초기화 후 isLoaded = true 작성자 닉네임 = ProxyUser
